about_the_game:
NOTE: This is a very early playable prototype of Machines of Madness. This version presents the main features and mechanics of the game, but the final product may differ from it significantly.

Machines of Madness is a pixel top-down shooter in which you find yourself in an extremely dangerous cyberworld swarming with deadly combat bots. Your task is to find a way home out of this perilous dimension. The good thing is, you won’t be alone: fight combats together with Phantoms, anthropomorphic programs with various abilities.


You play as a talented coder hooked on experimenting with cyberspace, so much so that he accidentally teleported to the world of soulless machines whose only purpose is to destroy everything in their way. That makes it a bit more difficult for you to come back home: after all, you are now the number one target for thousands of bloodthirsty bots.


Enter the Phantoms. In this world, the combat software you developed is here to protect you in the shapes of powerful creatures, each with a unique ability. A Phantom’s main feature is that when destroyed, it doesn’t disappear completely but leaves a recording in the combat field that repeats all of its actions and helps new Phantoms fight.


You set out to explore an enormous high-tech labyrinth of numerous rooms, each with hordes of enemy bots and tricky traps. If you want to get out alive, you’ll have to master operating the Phantoms. Use their incredible skills to engage in intensive shootouts, solve puzzles and finally find a way out of this nightmarish robotic world!


Key Features:

- 9 playable characters: each unique Phantom has its own ability. Knowing how to combine these abilities is essential for your success!

- A perfect combination of handcrafted level elements and a procedurally generated environment: all labyrinth rooms have unique layouts.

- Fast-paced action combat that will prove a real challenge even for the most skilled gamers.

- Phantom re-recording feature: you’ll have an opportunity to fight using several Phantoms at once, providing infinite options for combat strategies!

- Epic boss fights where you’ll face the most advanced eradicator machines!

- Puzzle sections where brutal force won't help you: will you find a clever enough way to engage with the environment?

- Charming pixel graphics

- The Arena mode, where you’ll be able to continuously fight endless waves of enemy bots and break personal records.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later 32 or 64 bit

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D compatible 3D graphics card with 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Has Sound

short_description: Can you survive in a world inhabited by deadly eradicator machines? Activate the anthropomorphic combat Phantoms and dive into non-stop pixel action in this dynamic top-down shooter!
